description: Flink is an open source system for expressive, declarative, fast, and efficient data analysis. Stratosphere combines the scalability and programming flexibility of distributed MapReduce-like platforms with the efficiency, out-of-core execution, and query optimization capabilities found in parallel databases. Flink was originally known as Stratosphere when it entered the Incubator.
mentor: Sean Owen, Ted Dunning, Owen O'Malley, Henry Saputra, Ashutosh Chauhan
